data.title: Our campuses
data.text:
Bad Gleichenberg is the newest and greenest FH JOANNEUM campus. The community of Bad Gleichenberg is the most traditional spa resort in Eastern Styria and a well-established training centre for the tourism and hotel industry. Three Bachelor’s degree programmes, one Master’s degree programme and two postgraduate Master’s courses are offered here. Some 360 students are enrolled at FH JOANNEUM Bad Gleichenberg.

Graz is a centre of business and innovation and a city of design and culture. It provides an excellent scientific environment for the 22 Bachelor’s degree programmes, 18 Master’s degree programmes and various postgraduate Master’s courses offered by FH JOANNEUM. A total of 3,500 students are currently studying on the 55,000 m² campus in Graz, which also houses the FH JOANNEUM management.

Kapfenberg offers three Bachelor’s degree programmes, five Master’s degree programmes and two postgraduate Master’s courses with a technical/business focus which fit perfectly into this innovative environment of high-tech companies and industry partners. Some 900 students are able to enjoy the special community feel here and benefit from the good network of courses and graduates.
